# Notification Name

**API Collection**

Name of the notification posted when the time zone changes.

## Constants

- **cfTimeZoneSystemTimeZoneDidChange**: Name of the notification posted when the system time zone changes.

## Constants

- **Time Zone Name Styles**: Constants to specify styles for time zone names.
